creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: large painting with rust colored pigment that is applied in a thick layer; dimensional elements under pigment that resemble thick straps that crisscross horizontally and are secured with large bolts and grommets, which have also been covered with pigment; paint coated ropes and cords dangle from straps on top, in the center and on the bottom; traces of yellow and green pigment show through in several areas
image_copyright: © Harmony Hammond %2F Licensed by VAGA at Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C NY
inscription: ULC on back, in black ink: HARMONY HAMMOND | \"COVERUP\" 2012
medium: Oil and mixed media on canvas
title: Coverup
